results.title: Statins for age-related macular degeneration.
results.text_hl: Both trials compared @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo in older people (> 50 or 60 years) with high risk of developing @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Drusen</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015593 @@@drusen@@@ present on examination).

citations.NLM: Gehlbach P, Li T, Hatef E. Statins for age-related macular degeneration. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2015 Feb 11;2(2):CD006927. PMID: 25675254
citations.BibTeX: @article{25675254, title={Statins for age-related macular degeneration.}, author={Gehlbach P and Li T and Hatef E}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, volume={2}, number={2}, pages={CD006927}}

results.title: Statins for age-related macular degeneration.
results.text_hl: Both trials compared @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo in older people (older than 50 or 60 years) with high risk of developing @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Drusen</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015593 @@@drusen@@@ present on examination).
